mapper.insert: insert into hbb_resume (user_id, resume_name, user_name, gender, phone, email, qq, birthday, age, native_place, img, work_year, education, hiredate, job_type, expect_area, industry_id, expect_emolument_low, expect_emolument_high, check_num, download_num, status, create_time, update_time, skill, evaluate) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{resumeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{nativePlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workYear,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{education,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hiredate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{jobType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{expectArea,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{industryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{expectEmolumentLow,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{expectEmolumentHigh,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{checkNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{downloadNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{skill,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{evaluate,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
